description.ko: 무중력의 어둠 속에서 투명한 생명체들이 춤추는, 심해의 숨겨진 빛에 대한 평화로운 탐구입니다.
description.en: A peaceful exploration of the deep sea's hidden light, where transparent life forms dance in the weightless dark.

prompt: A hyper-realistic cinematic shot of AQUA-5, featuring translucent jellyfish forms with #40E0D0 turquoise bioluminescent pulses drifting through a dark #000080 midnight zone. The creatures trail #48D1CC cyan fluid dynamics through the water. Tiny bubbles reflect the #006994 deep sea glow. The composition focuses on the weightless, peaceful dance of transparent life in a high-pressure abyss. 8k resolution, Unreal Engine 5 render, ethereal underwater atmosphere.
